DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study protein-sparing modify fast ( PSMF ) intervention weight loss obese endometrial cancer survivor . The PSMF diet low carbohydrate calorie , design induce fast , safe weight loss . The diet consist lean meat ( beef , pork , poultry , seafood ) amount adequate meet protein requirement base individual 's body weight . The PSMF may help endometrial cancer survivor achieve significant weight loss , reduce risk chronic disease , improve quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Protein-Sparing Modified Fast Intervention Weight Loss Obese Endometrial Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Investigate whether PSMF lead significant weight loss obese endometrial cancer survivor ( ECS ) . II . To assess whether approach feasible , whether participant remain study duration intervention adhere various component protocol . To assess feasibility , examine follow variable : drop-out rate ; rate adherence diet supplemental protocol ; rate common side-effects . III . Assess whether PSMF improve biomarkers disease risk population . To assess whether objective met , ass follow variable : blood lipid ( total cholesterol , low density lipid [ LDL ] cholesterol , high density lipid [ HDL ] cholesterol , triglyceride ) ; glucose ; marker inflammation ( C-reactive protein , interleukin-6 , tumor necrosis factor [ TNF ] -alpha , leptin ) . IV . Assess whether PSMF lead improvement quality life related weight loss . OUTLINE : PSMF : Participants instruct registered dietitian ( RD ) consume enough lean beef , pork , poultry , seafood provide 1.2 gram protein per kilogram obesity adjust ideal body weight . The protein recommendation communicate participant term gram per day . Participants encourage adhere closely possible protein recommendation . Based protein recommendation , participant advise consume give amount ( ounce ) beef , pork , poultry seafood daily , assume ounce product contain seven gram protein . Participants provide digital kitchen scale weigh protein-containing food permit 2 serving non-starchy vegetable per day . Participants remain PSMF successfully reduce initial body weight 15 % 6 month . Participants also provide supplement consume daily . WEIGHT MAINTENANCE DIET : After successful weight loss least 15 % initial body weight , participant instruct RD consume weight maintenance diet may remain PSMF . The weight maintenance diet consist gradual addition previously eliminate carbohydrate contain food group PSMF consumption non-starchy vegetable unlimited . Participants receive handout list common food number carbohydrates serve educate nutrition label reading carbohydrate , emphasis serve size total number carbohydrate per serve . After completion study , participant follow 2 4 week 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Previous diagnosis endometrial cancer , successfully treat surgery Body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 kg/m^2 > 8 week remove surgery treat endometrial cancer No previous diagnosis endometrial cancer BMI < 30 kg/m^2 Any history cardiovascular , kidney , liver disease Using medication treat diabetes History cardiac arrhythmia Inability comply follow regimen Inability read speak English Abstention meat animal product
